translated: Elder Story🔽The Sub-chapter on the Golden Palanquin
and I was satisfied with my hands;
for the sake of attaining the highest goal.
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving a palanquin.
there will be a warrior named Asama;
and the eight liberations as well;
The six supernormal knowledges have been realized,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”🔽Thus has it been heard by the Elder Suvaṇṇabibbohana.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā suvaṇṇabibbohaniyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Suvaṇṇabibbohaniyattherassāpadānaṁ paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā suvaṇṇabibbohaniyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽suvaṇṇabibbohaniya therassa apadānam paṭhama
translated: The Elder Suvaṇṇabibbohana’s Story is finished.
